channel.title: How do you not barbarian fish?
channel.description: So I've got 97 fishing, and all my tools are in my toolbelt. That includes my harpoon. When I got to fish sharks, instead of just using my harpoon and getting good XP/Hour, it barbarian fishes. Is there a way to like, not?

item.title: How do you not barbarian fish?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:16, topic:522409”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=640914.msg4320902#msg4320902 date=1372202656]

Someone wanna help ^.^?
[/quote]ill be glad to assist once kieran sends me a better computer lol

By then runescape won’t be popular[/quote]eh just waiting on the shipping fees report from him so I can pay for that.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you not barbarian fish?

item.title: How do you not barbarian fish?
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:12, topic:522409”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=640914.msg4320404#msg4320404 date=1372148179]
C2 Dung for 120k exp/h.
[/quote]get a friend to help do floors with you can easily get 1.5x that[/quote]
With a friend I was only experiencing 140k exp/h - 160k. Definitely not 180k. Perhaps EoC changed that because I can almost 1 hit anything in C2 now and I cannot remember how it was pre-EoC.

Another great way to train fishing is fish flingers. It’s about 140k exp/h.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you not barbarian fish?

item.title: How do you not barbarian fish?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

The animation may look slower, but you still have the same chances at catching the fish. Even at 99 I found sharks horribly slow, it was a faster catch rate doing rocktails. If you just want XP, probably power fly fish, or do monkfish

Read full topic
item.source: How do you not barbarian fish?

item.title: How do you not barbarian fish?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:6, topic:522409”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=640914.msg4318780#msg4318780 date=1371922945]

No, and it actually fishes at the same rate.

It’s always seemed slower for me.
Plus, I don’t need the str exp. 99 here.
[/quote]

You might as well just keep barbarian fishing even though you have 99 strength. Who wouldn’t want 50 or 100m xp in strength?[/quote]
I just want 99’s

Read full topic
item.source: How do you not barbarian fish?
